DOC.brief_summary: We investigate feasibility efficacy transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) patient GAD placebo nonresponders DIEF003523.1 .
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Generalized Anxiety Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: We expect enroll five patient GAD fail respond sham ( placebo ) TMS intervention . In pilot study enrol three participant protocol include 10 rTMS session ( twice week five week ) one protocol include 15 rTMS session ( three time week five week ) . Assessments occur pretreatment posttreatment .
DOC.criteria: Participated study DIEF003523.1 , receive sham `` placebo '' TMS achieve < 50 % improvement HARS 3 month followup .
